name: Protocol (itch) (David Hall)
description: Protocol puts the player inside the control system of an artificial intelligence, struggling to exist and survive in a world following the end of humanity. The player assumes control of a system of robots and support systems, managing resources in an attempt to balance survival with expansion. However, as the robots are unable to replicate technology equal to or greater than themselves, the player must be aware of the degradation of technology which is constantly occurring. Throughout the desolate world are scattered remnants of humanity, left behind in the wake of some great calamity.
